column3: Latest;Thursday 10 January 2019 | 10:35 CET | News------The number of registered SIM cards in Cambodia reached 19.3 million in November
column4: an increase of 3.9 percent compared with the same period in 2017
column5: according to data from the Telecommunication Regulator of Cambodia (TRC) reported by the Phnom Penh Post. The number is equivalent to 120.11 percent of Cambodia’s total population of more than 16 million. ------The report shows that mobile internet usage also showed strong growth
column6: with 12.9 million subscribers using their mobile phones to go online
column7: an increase of 22.8 percent year-on-year. A total of 34 operators provided fixed internet to 147
column10: while the number of fixed telephony lines fell 27.5 percent to 91
